title: Point 2 B(i)
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and sample responses, and to score the response.

Note: Some answers provided below may have acceptable variants. Teachers should use their discretion in accepting alternative answers.
descriptions:
The response does not accurately respond to the question.

Question B (i): Identify one and only one action that the Trojans did to the machina in lines 2-4 (Accingunt...intendunt) in order to get it through the city’s opened gates.

Examples that earn this point include the following:

  • they put rollers under its feet

  • they tied it up

The response accurately responds to the question.

title: Point 3 B(ii)
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and sample responses, and to score the response.

Note: Some answers provided below may have acceptable variants. Teachers should use their discretion in accepting alternative answers.
descriptions:
The response does not accurately respond to the question.

Question B (ii): Provide the specific Latin word or words that support your answer.

Examples that earn this point include the following:

  • subiciunt lapsus

  • intendunt stuppea vincula collo

The response accurately responds to the question.
